title: CHAMP SELECT is Cancerous
body:
After waiting four minutes, i get into a champ select and then it gets to last pick and they pick their champion but forget to lock in.
IF YOU DO NOT LOCK IN IT KICKS YOU OUT. AFTER 4 CHAMPION SELECTS AND 20 MINUTES OF WAITING I AM STILL NOT IN GAME. PLEASE PUT A WARNING THAT SAYS LOCK IN OR IT KICKS YOU OUT

replies.body: They do have a warning. It's a new system that literally just came out. Give it time for people to adjust. I was one of those people who picked my champion then wondered why I got booted with a 5 minute wait before requeue. Shit happens.
